forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 46. North northwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 2 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the quiet of the night gives way to the gentle optimism of a mostly sunny Tuesday. As dawn begins to unwrap the city, a soft chill lingers in the air, with temperatures hanging around a refreshing 46 degrees. By midday, beneath clear skies that promise a high near 60, the day will feel crisp yet inviting. The faint north-northwest breeze dances along at 2 to 10 mph, adding a touch of life to the serene morning.

The clarity of the day amplifies the unique beauty of the city, highlighting the silhouette of the Golden Gate and the urban landscape. This clarity signals a delightful opportunity for a leisurely stroll through the streets, preferably wrapped in layers—a light jacket or sweater will suffice against the coolness, especially as it makes way for the warmth of the afternoon sun. Perhaps an outing to explore a local nook, or a quiet moment savoring a coffee in a sunlit park, would be fitting as the city stirs awake. A perfect day awaits, where the urban rhythm pulses gently with the promise of a serene afternoon.
